input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Endura Women's Loop Waist Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Endura SingleTrack Short II Men's'
  - Name='Endura Men's Hummvee 3/4 Short'
  - Name='Sportful Fiandre NoRain 2 bib shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Bib Shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Assos x Mammut Tactica Liner Shorts'
  - Name='Assos EQUIPE RS Spring Fall Bib Tights S11 Men's'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R Habu Winter Bib Tights Men's S11'
  - Name='Assos Dyora RSV Bib Shorts S11 women'
  - Name='Assos Women's Tactica KIESKAFER T5 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='men Assos Mille GT Eisenherz Ultraz Winter S11 Bib Tights'
  - Name='Assos Trail Tactica Winter Liner Bib Tights HP T3'
  - Name='Assos Men's MILLE GT C2 Bib Shorts blackSeries / TIR'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts, BlackSeries / Small'
  - Name='ASSOS Men's EQUIPE RS BIB SHORT'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille Gt Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe RS S9 Bib Shorts 2021 2XL BLACK'
  - Name='Assos Men's Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos EQUIPE RSR Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos T. Campionissimo S7 Cycling Bib Shorts XLG'
  - Name='Assos Men's Cycling Bib'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Summit Raptor Compression Cycling Bibs'
  - Name='Sportful Neo Bib Shorts Black'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Women's Loop Waist Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are cycling shorts but not bib shorts; lack of bib straps reduces similarity to the reference bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura SingleTrack Short II Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are cycling shorts designed as loose shorts, not tight bib shorts; different construction and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Hummvee 3/4 Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are 3/4 loose cycling shorts, not bib shorts; different silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Fiandre NoRain 2 bib shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are bib shorts with weather protection features, similar construction and intended use as reference; possibly more focused on rain protection but overall quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance bib shorts similar in construction, purpose, and quality to the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General Rapha bib shorts, matching the reference in product type and use case closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's bib shorts designed for cycling with performance focus, very close match in style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Assos x Mammut Tactica Liner Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Liner shorts not full bib shorts; may be worn under bibs but different product category and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos EQUIPE RS Spring Fall Bib Tights S11 Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib tights (full leg coverage) rather than bib shorts, but similar construction and intended use; reasonable relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R Habu Winter Bib Tights Men's S11
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Winter bib tights provide full leg coverage and insulation rather than shorts; less direct similarity but same bib structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Dyora RSV Bib Shorts S11 women
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's bib shorts with similar function and construction, very relevant especially regarding bib short silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Women's Tactica KIESKAFER T5 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's bib shorts designed for cycling; highly relevant to the reference product's features and form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Assos Mille GT Eisenherz Ultraz Winter S11 Bib Tights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Winter bib tights differ from bib shorts, but share the bib design and cycling use; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Trail Tactica Winter Liner Bib Tights HP T3
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Winter liner bib tights vary from short bib shorts, with added insulation; somewhat relevant but less so due to length and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's MILLE GT C2 Bib Shorts blackSeries / TIR
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's bib shorts closely matching reference in style, function, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts, BlackSeries / Small
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, a standard bib short highly relevant to the reference bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Men's EQUIPE RS BIB SHORT
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end men's bib shorts suitable for long rides; strongly relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille Gt Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Again, a men's bib short closely matching the reference in construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe RS S9 Bib Shorts 2021 2XL BLACK
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar high-performance cycling bib shorts; very relevant counterpart to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General men's cycling bib shorts matching the product type and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos EQUIPE RSR Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance bib shorts share design, function, and intended use with reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos T. Campionissimo S7 Cycling Bib Shorts XLG
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium men's bib shorts with similar silhouette and performance features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Cycling Bib

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Summit Raptor Compression Cycling Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's compression cycling bib shorts, similar construction, purpose and high relevance, although compression focus might differ slightly.
